TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FloatingPointNumerics extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Helper routines for working with floating point numbers

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool AreAlmostEqualUlps (double left, double right, long maxUlps);
.method public static hidebysig bool AreAlmostEqualUlps(float64 left, float64 right, int64 maxUlps) cil managed

Docs.param: First double precision floating point value to be compared
Second double precision floating point value t be compared
Maximum number of representable double precision floating point values that are allowed to be between the left and the right double precision floating point values
Docs.summary: Compares two double precision floating point values for equality
Docs.returns: True if both numbers are equal or close to being equal

MemberSignature.Value: public static bool AreAlmostEqualUlps (float left, float right, int maxUlps);
.method public static hidebysig bool AreAlmostEqualUlps(float32 left, float32 right, int32 maxUlps) cil managed

Docs.param: First floating point value to be compared
Second floating point value t be compared
Maximum number of representable floating point values that are allowed to be between the left and the right floating point values
Docs.summary: Compares two floating point values for equality
Docs.returns: True if both numbers are equal or close to being equal

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig float64 ReinterpretAsDouble(int64 value) cil managed

Docs.param: Integer whose memory contents to reinterpret
Docs.summary: Reinterprets the memory contents of an integer value as a double precision floating point value
Docs.returns: The memory contents of the integer interpreted as a double precision floating point value

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig float32 ReinterpretAsFloat(int32 value) cil managed

Docs.param: Integer value whose memory contents to reinterpret
Docs.summary: Reinterprets the memory contents of an integer as a floating point value
Docs.returns: The memory contents of the integer value interpreted as a floating point value

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int32 ReinterpretAsInt(float32 value) cil managed

Docs.param: Floating point value whose memory contents to reinterpret
Docs.summary: Reinterprets the memory contents of a floating point value as an integer value
Docs.returns: The memory contents of the floating point value interpreted as an integer

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig int64 ReinterpretAsLong(float64 value) cil managed

Docs.param: Double precision floating point value whose memory contents to reinterpret
Docs.summary: Reinterprets the memory contents of a double precision floating point value as an integer value
Docs.returns: The memory contents of the double precision floating point value interpreted as an integer
